desc: Hi!We are looking for curious and open-minded photographers enthusiast to expand their skill set in 'photogrammetry', a process of taking a series of overlapping images to produce a 3D representation of a subject, and to make a bit of money on the side!Scan the World is a community-built archive of 3D printable objects of cultural significance. Every object in the archive originates from photogrammetry scan data before being optimized for 3D printing.We are looking for freelance photographers to join us in our goal to digitize sculptures, cultural artifacts and other pieces to spread 3D printable culture all over the world!We look forward to hearing from you.

desc: Hello,I'm Matt Webb, President of Community Biofuels Inc.  My business collects used cooking oil from restaurants and processes through a micro processor into biodiesel.  Beside the processor, is mated a diesel tank.  At the end of the tank is a blending dispenser pump that you would see at a gas station.  Customers can pull up at the pump and choose a B5, B10, B20, or B50 blend for their vehicle.My project requires someone to put together a professional concept image of our prototype.  I currently have a sketch which I used images from google of shipping containers, a Mercedes sprinter van, and a diesel tank with dispenser pump.  I have several different files for my Logo which I would like in a few areas of the image eg. on the side of the shipping container, on the sprinter van.   We also have an image available of my brother and I standing on the proposed property(not sure if it would be possible to superimpose, etc/reason I'm using this website:)).Basically, we're going with a green and white theme, including sprinter van and shipping containers(40ft), diesel tank (11,000L).I would like this to be completed no later than the 18th of August.
